named-query.name: CalculatedDataEntity.getLatestDateByCollectorid
named-query.query: SELECT a FROM CalculatedDataEntity a WHERE a.id.collectorid = :collectorid ORDER BY a.id.dateTime DESC

named-query.name: CalculatedDataEntity.getOldestDateByCollectorid
named-query.query: SELECT a FROM CalculatedDataEntity a WHERE a.id.collectorid = :collectorid ORDER BY a.id.dateTime ASC

named-query.name: CalculatedDataEntity.getCollectorItemParentListByCollectorItemCode
named-query.query: SELECT DISTINCT b.parentItemCode, a.id.itemCode, a.id.displayName, a.id.collectorid FROM CalculatedDataEntity a, CollectorItemCodeMstEntity b WHERE a.id.collectorid = :collectorid AND a.id.itemCode = b.itemCode ORDER BY a.id.itemCode, a.id.displayName

named-query.name: CalculatedDataEntity.getCollectorItemParentListByHttpScenario
named-query.query: SELECT DISTINCT CASE WHEN a.id.itemCode = '0' THEN null ELSE '0' END AS parentItemCode, a.id.itemCode, a.id.displayName, a.id.collectorid FROM CalculatedDataEntity a, MonitorInfoEntity b WHERE a.id.collectorid = :collectorid ORDER BY a.id.itemCode, a.id.displayName

named-query.name: CalculatedDataEntity.getCollectorItemParentListByMonitorInfo
named-query.query: SELECT DISTINCT null AS parentItemCode, a.id.itemCode, a.id.displayName, a.id.collectorid FROM CalculatedDataEntity a, MonitorInfoEntity b WHERE a.id.collectorid = :collectorid AND a.id.itemCode = b.monitorId ORDER BY a.id.itemCode, a.id.displayName

named-query.name: CalculatedDataEntity.deleteByCollectorid
named-query.query: DELETE FROM CalculatedDataEntity a WHERE a.id.collectorid = :collectorid

named-query.name: CalculatedDataEntity.findByCollectoridFacilityidDateTime
named-query.query: SELECT a FROM CalculatedDataEntity a WHERE a.id.collectorid = :collectorid AND a.id.facilityid = :facilityid AND a.id.dateTime <= :dateTime ORDER BY a.id.dateTime, a.id.itemCode, a.id.displayName, a.value

named-query.name: CollectorCalcMethodMstEntity.findAll
named-query.query: SELECT a FROM CollectorCalcMethodMstEntity a ORDER BY a.calcMethod

named-query.name: CollectorCategoryCollectMstEntity.findAll
named-query.query: SELECT a FROM CollectorCategoryCollectMstEntity a ORDER BY a.id.platformId, a.id.subPlatformId, a.id.categoryCode

named-query.name: CollectorCategoryCollectMstEntity.findByPlatformIdAndSubPlatformId
named-query.query: SELECT a FROM CollectorCategoryCollectMstEntity a WHERE a.id.platformId = :platformId AND a.id.subPlatformId = :subPlatformId ORDER BY a.id.platformId, a.id.subPlatformId, a.id.categoryCode

named-query.name: CollectorCategoryMstEntity.findAll
named-query.query: SELECT a FROM CollectorCategoryMstEntity a ORDER BY a.categoryCode

named-query.name: CollectorItemCodeMstEntity.findAll
named-query.query: SELECT a FROM CollectorItemCodeMstEntity a ORDER BY a.itemCode

named-query.name: CollectorItemCalcMethodMstEntity.findAll
named-query.query: SELECT a FROM CollectorItemCalcMethodMstEntity a ORDER BY a.id.collectMethod, a.id.platformId, a.id.subPlatformId, a.id.itemCode

named-query.name: CollectorItemCalcMethodMstEntity.findByPlatformIdAndSubPlatformId
named-query.query: SELECT a FROM CollectorItemCalcMethodMstEntity a WHERE a.id.platformId = :platformId AND a.id.subPlatformId = :subPlatformId ORDER BY a.id.collectMethod, a.id.platformId, a.id.subPlatformId, a.id.itemCode

named-query.name: CollectorPollingMstEntity.findAll
named-query.query: SELECT a FROM CollectorPollingMstEntity a ORDER BY a.id.collectMethod, a.id.platformId, a.id.subPlatformId, a.id.itemCode, a.id.variableId

named-query.name: CollectorPollingMstEntity.findVariableId
named-query.query: SELECT a FROM CollectorPollingMstEntity a WHERE a.id.collectMethod = :collectMethod AND a.id.platformId = :platformId AND a.id.subPlatformId = :subPlatformId AND a.id.itemCode = :itemCode ORDER BY a.id.collectMethod, a.id.platformId, a.id.subPlatformId, a.id.itemCode, a.id.variableId
